fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: Savor the succulent sweetness of an apple picked fresh from our orchard. They are perfect for a healthy snack or adding a touch of natural sweetness to your favorite recipes.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: Indulge in the creamy richness of our premium bananas, harvested at the peak of ripeness. Blend one into a tropical smoothie or eat it on the go, no matter what our bananas promise a burst of flavor in every bite.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: Experience the refreshing tang of our hand-selected oranges. Radiating with juicy citrus goodness, they make the perfect snack for a sunny day.

fruits.name: Lemon
fruits.description: Whether adding a splash of flavor to your favorite dish or brewing a pitcher of home made lemondade, our hand-picked lemons will shatter your expectations. Embrace the vibrant zest and citrus flavor of our freshly-picked lemons to elevate your culinary creations with their bold and invigorating essence.

fruits.name: Lime
fruits.description: Explore the invigorating burst of zest and tang in our hand-picked limes, perfect for adding a refreshing twist to your culinary creations. Whether squeezed into cocktails, drizzled over seafood, or infused into marinades, our limes promise to brighten every dish with their lively citrus flavor.

fruits.name: Kiwi
fruits.description: Discover the exotic sweetness and vibrant green hue of our succulent kiwis, hand-picked for optimal ripeness. Whether enjoyed sliced as a refreshing snack, blended into smoothies, or added to fruit salads for a burst of tropical flavor, our kiwis promise a delightful taste of paradise in every bite.
